text:
Splunk | Data Visualization Engineer (Frontend)| San Francisco, CA | ONSITE | Full-time | Benefits + Equity [0]

My team at Splunk is currently looking for a Data Visualization Engineer to help build tools and visualizations to analyze and extract insights from data utilizing state of the art frontend technologies.

Sounds interesting? Read more: http://bit.ly/data-viz-engineer-splunk

Feel free to ping me at pwied at company name .com (add HN to the subject) if you have any questions

[0] https://www.splunk.com/view/SP-CAAAGK5
